獻.definition: to offer; to present; to dedicate; to donate; to show; to put on display; worthy person (old)

獻出.definition: to offer; to give (as tribute); to devote (one's life); to sacrifice (oneself)

獻媚.definition: to ingratiate oneself with; to pander to

獻寶.definition: to present a treasure; to offer a valuable piece of advice; to show off what one treasures

獻愛心.definition: to give to the needy; to donate to charity

獻殷勤.definition: to be particularly attentive to (an attractive young lady or man etc); to fawn upon (an influential politician etc); to court sb's favor; to ingratiate oneself

獻禮.definition: to offer sth in tribute (often on a special occasion); to dedicate; an offering; a tribute

獻策.definition: to offer advice; to make a suggestion

獻縣.definition: Xian county in Cangzhou 滄州|沧州[Cang1 zhou1], Hebei

獻花.definition: to offer flowers; to lay flowers (as a memorial)

獻計.definition: to offer advice; to make a suggestion

獻身.definition: to commit one's energy to; to devote oneself to; to sacrifice one's life for; (coll.) (of a woman) to give one's virginity to

獻醜.definition: (used self-deprecatingly, e.g. when asked to sing a song) to put one's artistic incompetence on display
